description:
This course is not sponsored by or affiliated with Udemy, Inc.

Learn how to make money teaching online courses with this step by step system.

[NOTICE: Hurry up and buy this course... It won't be available for very much longer. It'a amazing to get so much info for so little money, but in a few days I'll stop offering it for sale so I can pursue other projects... However, all those who enroll before then will keep lifetime access, I just won't sell it to new students]

Transform yourself from someone who trades hours for dollars, and can only make as much money as you have hours to trade...

...Into someone who invests several hours creating an awesome online course, then gets paid for those same hours and that course over and over again! 

That's the magic of leveraging and scaling your time with a product that you create, rather than just getting paid for only the hours you show up to work for someone else

Authors use it... Musicians use it... Software developers use it... now you can use it with online courses!

Be free, live life on YOUR own terms. Earn money for what YOU know, what YOU are passionate about...

CLICK THE GREEN "TAKE THIS COURSE" BUTTON ABOVE & GET STARTED TODAY!

••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

In This Course, You'll Learn How To:

  • Choose a profitable course topic on things you know well
  • Quickly research & teach other topics you don't know well
  • Rapidly organize your ideas into a simple course outline
  • Create and follow a rapid, step by step system to build your course
  • Rapidly create high quality course content that's simple and fun to produce
  • Market and sell your course daily to millions of students worldwide

••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

Read What Current Students Have To Say About This Course:

"Awesome course James, thanks for sharing your knowledge! This course is very well laid out for beginners who are interested in creating their first course. Jams provides a live example along with great web resources to use. His enthusiasm shows throughout the course I highly recommend it". - Sylvia Dart

"GREAT COURSE! I loved the focus in this course on actually creating a course and the step by step instructions and live examples made it soooo much easier to understand everthing" - Suzayn
